Complex preparation for English UPE

It won’t be easy.

But you’re guaranteed to get
+25 points
i want a free lesson i want a free lesson

Advantages

  • Adapted author's UPE program

  • Modern
    teaching methods

  • Financial guarantee
    the result

The main problems of students
in English UPE, which
we help to solve

  1. Grammar
  2. Inability to understand spoken English
  3. Stingy vocabulary for writing an essay
  4. Preparing alone
  5. Lack of a single knowledge resource
  6. Lack of self-organization and laziness

How do we do it

  • Adapted program preparation for UPE

    You will learn grammar and vocabulary at the same time. And you will learn how to write essays.

  • Classroom and online learning

    The teacher will help not only in the classroom, but also during home preparation. Parents can chat if they wish.

  • The habit of reading in English

    Articles from sources that are used in the development of this UPE will be received by phone twice a week.

  • Psychological support

    We will teach you testing techniques, the ability to plan your confidence training in itself.

  • Training on copyright manuals

    You don't have to waste your time on a search for material and to buy anything extra. We have compiled 2 manuals for you.

  • Ability to comprehend spoken English

    “F.R.I.E.N.D.S” won't help you. You will listen regularly and analyze audio recordings in accordance with the studied vocabulary.

Our program

  • 1 semester

    • — Grammar

      • Nouns & Articles
      • Adjectives & Adverb

    • — Vocabulary

      • Family & Relations
      • People & Society

  • 2 semester

    • — Grammar

      • Pronouns
      • Active Voice
      • Passive Voice

    • — Vocabulary

      • Home
      • School
      • Work

  • 3 semester

    • — Grammar

      • Modal verbs
      • Infinitive Gerund
      • Participle: 1, 2

    • — Vocabulary

      • Travel & Tourism
      • Culture & Free Time
      • Sport

    • — Vocabulary

      • Informal Letter

  • 4 semester

    • — Grammar

      • Clauses: Conditional and Wishes
      • Direct / Reported speech
      • Preposition
      • Conjunction
      • Numeral

    • — Vocabulary

      • Healthy Living
      • Nature & Environment
      • Money

    • — Vocabulary

      • Formal Letter

  • 5 semester

    • —

      • Revision
      • Tests

Why do people choose us

  1. Training in small groups
  2. Rendered notes
  3. Each lesson has a goal and a specific result
  4. The real results of the teacher
  5. The course program meets the requirements of the MES of Ukraine
  6. Set of groups by level of knowledge

Teacher

Elena Moreva

  • 6 yeards of experience in preparing students for UPE
  • Own result of passing VNO - 197 points 2 years in a row
  • Passed excellent at the international analogue of UPE - Cambridge PET (Preliminary English Test)

Graduated from the Institute of International Relations of the NAU with a degree in translator-analyst.

In spare time takes courses from the best universities in the world on effective teaching and essay writing techniques.

Completed: English Grammar and Essay Writing (Berkeley), English Grammar & Style (The University of Queesland), How to Write an Essay (Berkeley), Academic and Business Writing (Berkeley), The Art of Teaching (GEMS education), Powerful Tools for Teaching and Learning (University of Houston).

Cambrige English Entry Level Certificate

We guarantee

  • You will pass the UPE with at least 25 points better than on the first practice test. Otherwise, we will refund your money.*
  • You will learn to write essays with at least 10 points out of 14. While 20% of the students received 0 for essays.
  • You will study in your area. We will choose the location for the classes after the teams have been formed.
  • Teams will be formed based on the starting level of the students. We take into account the characteristics of each student.

Feedback from graduates

  • Larysa Tymoshenko

    Graduated from 2015, National University of Bioresources and natural history of Ukraine

    In a short time with Elena, I mastered grammar and replenished my completely empty vocabulary. From the first lesson I realized that I was on my plate. Elena and I became friends because she was really worried about my success. She became an authority for me, but I did not tremble in class, fearing to make the slightest mistake.
